Package com.dao

Interface BookDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookDaoImpl
public interface BookDao
The BookDao interface represents operations related to managing books in a data store. Implementations of this interface provide methods to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on BookDtls entities.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addBooks​(BookDtls b)
    Adds a book to the data store.
    boolean
    deleteBooks​(int id)
    Deletes a book from the data store based on the provided ID.
    List<BookDtls>
    getAllBooks()
    Retrieves all books from the data store.
    BookDtls
    getBookById​(int id)
    Retrieves a specific book from the data store based on the provided ID.
    boolean
    updateEditBooks​(BookDtls b)
    Updates the information of an existing book in the data store.

  • Method Details

    • addBooks

      boolean addBooks​(BookDtls b)
      Adds a book to the data store.
      Parameters:
      b - The BookDtls object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getAllBooks

      List<BookDtls> getAllBooks()
      Retrieves all books from the data store.
      Returns:
      A List of BookDtls objects representing all available books.

    • getBookById

      BookDtls getBookById​(int id)
      Retrieves a specific book from the data store based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the book to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The BookDtls object representing the book with the provided ID, or null if not found.

    • updateEditBooks

      boolean updateEditBooks​(BookDtls b)
      Updates the information of an existing book in the data store.
      Parameters:
      b - The BookDtls object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the book information is successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • deleteBooks

      boolean deleteBooks​(int id)
      Deletes a book from the data store based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the book to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully deleted, false otherwise.
